product_name: Levi's Commuter Hybrid Trucker Bike Jacket - Men's
long_description: Clean design, ample stretch and windproof protection make the men's Levi's Commuter Hybrid Trucker soft-shell bike jacket a great choice for riding city streets. Sturdy 100% polyester soft-shell fabric offers 4-way stretch; it's also windproof and water resistant. Front pockets have concealed zippers. Levi's Commuter Hybrid Trucker bike jacket for men offers a concealed phone pocket on the sleeve.
short_description: Clean design, ample stretch and windproof protection make the men's Levi's Commuter Hybrid Trucker soft-shell bike jacket a great choice for riding city streets.
